column2: Tracks the location of nearby solar bodies.
Each perk you pick up increases your movement speed slightly.
Enemies will always drop their souls.
Dying enemies will draw from the current biome to produce a soul.
Enemies have a chance to drop a wand on death.
Reaped enemies will drop an additional soul.
Increases your damage, but makes you slide around
Guarantees enemies drop their soul when they die
Causes enemies in a large field to drop their souls on death
Consumes a portion of your souls to increase a projectile's damage
No Ikkuna. This is not a portal.
Expels a soul in the form of a magical projectile
Increases the power and speed of your spells at the cost of a soul
Enables your wand to cut the souls from your enemies
Detonates a soul to produce an explosion
Rain down bombs and also poison
Emits a laser to assist with aiming
there but for the grace of God go I
Makes a projectile move towards your foes in a random manner
A not so weak but enchanting sparkling projectile
Converts nearby materials to lava upon landing
Makes any blood within a projectile's range turns into steam
Makes enemies cast a copy of the spell on death
The next spell is casted with a soul instead of using mana
All enemies on screen are marked to drop their soul
Converts your Gilded souls into gold
The wand costs no mana and the first cast costs souls instead
Releases up to eight souls to guard you from harm and reap nearby enemies
Cast once to mark a point and cast again to return to that point
Enemies drop a random soul on death
Guarantees enemies drop a gilded soul when they die
Guarantees enemies drop a mage soul when they die
Guarantees enemies drop a fly soul when they die
Guarantees enemies drop a spider soul when they die
Enemies drop two souls when they die
Expels a soul in the form of a bouncing projectile
Your souls become minions to fight and reap for you
Soul minions are converted into healing fields
Soul minions are transformed into nukes
Transforms every projectile on screen into a big worm
A slow orb that eats through all obstacles
Converts 50 souls into an elemental stone
Maybe use a trigger for this one...
Fires an arrow that heals for the longer it flies
Teleport forward, reaping souls in an area that grows the longer you teleport for
The next spell is skipped if the wand is not being casted continuously
The next spell is skipped if the wand is being casted continuously
Bring forth the soul of Ikkuna's jailer (summons a boss)
Improves the cast delay and recharge time of the wand at the cost of a soul
Hand me my shovel, I'm going in!
The tome can see nearby reap-marked enemies
Right click to cycle which spell you cast from the tome. Costs 3 souls to cast.
Cast on the tome to upgrade selected stat, right click to cycle stat.
Cast on the tome to upgrade selected stat, right click to cycle stat. Costs 50% less souls!
While holding the wand, consumes souls to heal the player
Consume a soul to fire a powerful, slow moving projectile
Launch a soul powered arrow that flies through terrain
Launches a mine. It may explode!
its ice time teleport to the ice its ice time for you
Right click to cycle which buff you receive
Enemies killed by the tome drop an additional soul
Any enemy the halo touches takes more damage from all sources
A rat king is a collection of rats or mice whose tails are intertwined and bound together in some way
Shoots a projectile that can be detonated with a right click
For every 5 casts, the next shot is buffed significantly
Launches a collectable throwing axe from the tome
Creates a random spell from the tome
Heals you while holding the tome
Fires a flurry of projectiles that cause the ground to crack
Expends a soul per killed enemy to give a chance at additional loot
Right click to consume a soul to boost the next cast
Left click to slice for a soul and right click to dash
Right click to load a soul into the chamber and left click to fire
